'''Evenstar''' is the eighth track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. Named after [[Arwen|Arwen Evenstar]], it's used as Arwen and [[Aragorn]]'s theme in ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|The Lord of the Rings film series]]''.<ref name="AnnotatedScore">[[Doug Adams]] ([[2006]]), ''The Annotated Score (Part II: The Two Towers)'', pp. 16, 32</ref>

The text was written by [[Fran Walsh]] and [[Philippa Boyens]], with [[Sindarin]] translation by [[David Salo]]. Solo vocals are performed by Isabel Bayrakdarian.<ref name="AnnotatedScore" />

Evenstar is also featured as a part of [[One of the Dunedain]], the seventh track of disc two on [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - The Complete Recordings]].

==Lyrics==
<poem>
U i vethed...
na i onnad.
Si boe u-dhannathach
Ae u-esteliach nad –
Estelio han –
Estelio veleth.
</poem>

==English translation==
<poem>
This is not the end...
It is the beginning.
You cannot falter now
If you trust nothing else
Trust this -
Trust love.
</poem>
